product_name: Moving Comfort Endurance Capri Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built for chafe-free comfort, the women's Moving Comfort Endurance Capri Tights use performance fabric and a wide, flat, flattering waistband to help you reach your fitness goals. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying polyester fabric helps you stay comfortable and focused on the workout. UPF 50+ sun protection. Wide, ribbed waistband offers a flattering fit with curved design lines. The Moving Comfort Endurance Capri Tights offer a next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: Built for chafe-free comfort, the women's Moving Comfort Endurance Capri Tights use performance fabric and a wide, flat, flattering waistband to help you reach your fitness goals.
